name: modifyNonEmptyLast
description:
Apply a function to the last element, creating a new `NonEmptyReadonlyArray`.
*Example
documentation:
Apply a function to the last element, creating a new `NonEmptyReadonlyArray`.
*Example**

```ts
import { Array } from "effect"

const result = Array.modifyNonEmptyLast([1, 2, 3], n => n * 2)
console.log(result) // [1, 2, 6]
```
